border--x-transparent.title: Horizontal transparent border
border--x-transparent.description: Sets the left and right borders to transparent.

border--x-white.title: Horizontal white border
border--x-white.description: Sets the left and right borders to white for a clean, neutral appearance.

border--x-white--10.description: Sets the left and right borders to white with 10% opacity for a subtle, translucent effect.
